messages.content: You are an expert nutritionist and sports dietitian specializing in personalized meal plans.
Create a meal plan for me. I'm a runner training for a marathon, looking to improve endurance and recovery. I don't eat red meat and prefer to have 5 smaller meals throughout the day.

{
  "id": "mp-marathon-runner",
  "name": "Marathon Runner's Endurance Nutrition Plan",
  "description": "A balanced meal plan designed for marathon runners, focusing on complex carbohydrates, lean proteins, and nutrient timing to support endurance training and recovery.",
  "dailyPlans": [
    {
      "day": "Day 1",
      "meals": [
        {
          "name": "Early Morning (Pre-Run)",
          "time": "6:00 AM",
          "foods": [
            {
              "name": "Banana",
              "servingSize": "1 medium",
              "calories": 105,
              "protein": 1.3,
              "carbs": 27,
              "fat": 0.4,
              "notes": "Quick source of energy"
            },
            {
              "name": "Rice Cake with Honey",
              "servingSize": "2 cakes, 1 tbsp honey",
              "calories": 130,
              "protein": 2,
              "carbs": 28,
              "fat": 1,
              "notes": "Easy to digest carbohydrates"
            }
          ],
          "totalCalories": 235,
          "totalProtein": 3.3,
          "totalCarbs": 55,
          "totalFat": 1.4
        },
        {
          "name": "Breakfast (Post-Run)",
          "time": "8:30 AM",
          "foods": [
            {
              "name": "Oatmeal with Berries",
              "servingSize": "1 cup cooked",
              "calories": 150,
              "protein": 5,
              "carbs": 27,
              "fat": 2.5,
              "notes": "Slow-release carbs for sustained energy"
            },
            {
              "name": "Greek Yogurt",
              "servingSize": "3/4 cup",
              "calories": 100,
              "protein": 18,
              "carbs": 5,
              "fat": 0.5,
              "notes": "Recovery protein"
            },
            {
              "name": "Mixed Nuts",
              "servingSize": "1 oz",
              "calories": 170,
              "protein": 5,
              "carbs": 7,
              "fat": 15,
              "notes": "Healthy fats and additional protein"
            }
          ],
          "totalCalories": 420,
          "totalProtein": 28,
          "totalCarbs": 39,
          "totalFat": 18
        }
      ],
      "totalCalories": 2145,
      "totalProtein": 130.3,
      "totalCarbs": 270,
      "totalFat": 65.4,
      "notes": "Focus on hydration throughout the day. Aim for at least 3 liters of water, more on heavy training days."
    }
  ],
  "calorieTarget": 2100,
  "macroSplit": {
    "protein": 25,
    "carbs": 55,
    "fat": 20
  }
}
